subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tayshaun Prince scored 24 points and the Detroit Pistons beat the host Indiana Pacers, 100-85, last night to guarantee the Pacers their first losing season in a decade.
snippet: Tayshaun Prince scored 24 points and the Detroit Pistons beat the host Indiana Pacers, 100-85, last night to guarantee the Pacers their first losing season in a decade.
